\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G2316"\w* \w forget|strong="G1950"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* shewn \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w minister|strong="G1247"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* slothful, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* followers \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w them|strong="G1223"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w patience|strong="G3115"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w making|strong="G1861"\w* \w promise|strong="G1861"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w because|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2192"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2192"\w* \w might|strong="G0011"\w* \w swear|strong="G3660"\w*, \w swore|strong="G3660"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*,
